properties.title: Castor and its integration into web service frameworks

author.email: werner DOT guttmann AT gmx DOT net

properties.author: Werner Guttmann
properties.abstract: Describes how Castor's XML data binding functionality and its code generator are integrated into web service frameworks.

section.title: Introduction
section.p: To leverage Castor's core strength - support for enterprise-level XML data binding functionality - many web service framework vendors have started to offer integration of their respective products and XML data binding frameworks in general and Castor in particular. This allows users of web service frameworks to leverage the strengths of both worlds, making it easier to meet the requirements of mission-critical enterprise-level web service offerings.
